column1: '''Girithron''' is the [[Sindarin]] name for the twelfth month of the year
column3: according to the calendars of the [[Dunedain]]. ''Girithron'' in the [[Kings' Reckoning|Kings']] and [[Stewards' Reckoning]] corresponded to [[Foreyule]] in the [[Shire Calendar]] (approximately modern [[21 November]] through [[20 December]]).<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>
